body_html: HI @daeyun, i have met the same problem. But I didn't define any tf.train.Server object. And my code is like sess = sv.prepare_or_wait_for_session(config=tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=gpu_options)) directly. So where should I pass the config object to??? Thanks!

body: HI @daeyun, i have met the same problem. But I didn't define any `tf.train.Server` object. And my code is like `sess = sv.prepare_or_wait_for_session(config=tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=gpu_options))` directly. So where should I pass the `config` object to??? Thanks!
